mapper.select: SELECT id, sno, name, gender, password, portraitPath, email, telephone, address, introduction, clazzName FROM ssm_student.tb_student WHERE name = #{name} AND password = #{password}

SELECT id, sno, name, gender, password, portraitPath, email, telephone, address, introduction, clazzName FROM ssm_student.tb_student
AND name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{name}),'%') or sno=#{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ssm_student.tb_student(sno, name, gender, password, portraitPath, email, telephone, address, introduction,clazzName) VALUES (#{sno}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{password}, #{portraitPath}, #{email}, #{telephone}, #{address},#{introduction}, #{clazzName})
